title: Review set
description: An array containing all set of reviews not yet stored in liv database

name.description: Full name of the person filling the review. First Middle and last name

cpr.description: CPR or customer number for the person filling the review

tlf.description: Contact phone number. Can inlcude space and country code

contactTime.description: When the customer wants to be contacted

accidentDate.description: Date for when the accident happened, will be as a DateTime (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:SS) but only date is relevent

location.description: Where did the accident happen. kan be a long string with description

received.description: DateTime (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:SS) for when the review got inserted into Topprp database

how.description: Description of how the accident happened

flowType.description: Value that descripes if this review is handles with JSON or XML, for testing purposes

reviewItems.description: Array that holds all the different reviewItems associated with the review

items.description: Associative array that hold data for each reviewItem

itemName.description: Name of the revieItem, used to identify what the data is about

itemValue.description: Holds the value for the review item

itemfail.description: Holds the value for the review item
